Name: Exit From
About the game: Exit From - is a first-person hardcore horror-stealth game with quest and rogue-lite elements where you have to get out of the old Soviet house, which changes every new game. The main character wakes up from a thunderstorm and does not understand where he is. All apartments are empty and no one. You decide to get out, and, over time, you realize that the house is not so empty. Can you find a way out and not give up? All players will receive the Enhanced Edition for free as soon as it is available! Features: Steam Inventory items!!! RTX and DLSS 2.0 Location is an old Soviet house House —Åhanging and location of objects with each new game Depressing atmosphere System of hiding in the shadows. Matchstick system Icons of letters in achevements! Achievements will give you special items in your begin room Trade Cards
